title: Halogen Recognized Again This Year for Its Innovative Leade
text:
Halogen wins the Brandon Hall Group Bronze Excellence Award – the second leadership development award received this year 
OTTAWA, Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -  Halogen Software (TSX: HGN) has been recognized for its innovative leadership development program in the Brandon Hall Group 2015 HCM Excellence Awards. The talent management vendor received a bronze award in the Best Advance in Leadership Development category for the program, which focuses on the ongoing development of the company's current and future leaders.
Halogen's leadership development program supports both individual contributors identified as emerging leaders in the organization, as well as frontline managers, directors and executives to enhance key competencies important to the company's success.
"We are honored to be recognized by the Brandon Hall Group for our leadership development framework and outcomes," says Dominique Jones , VP of Human Resources, Halogen Software. "At Halogen we believe everyone deserves to work for a great leader and deserves the opportunity to develop his or her own leadership skills. As a fast-growth company, employee and leadership development is a critical area of investment for us to ensure our people are our lasting competitive advantage."
Halogen Software's leadership development programs were also recognized this past spring with a 2015 Leadership 500 Excellence Award. Halogen placed third overall in the International Company category.
Excellence Awards winners will be honored at Brandon Hall Group's HCM Excellence Conference January 27-29, 2016 , at the PGA National Resort in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida .
To view the complete list of the 2015 HCM Excellence Award winners, visit:
http://brandonhall.com/excellence-leadership.php?year=2015
